https://t.co/ObI1ZXWZci

#ChinaUN50Years in Numbers
China is now 2nd largest financial contributor to both UN & UN peacekeeping operations
China has sent >50,000 peacekeepers to UN operations

W/ a political system strong on implementation, China is running ahead of its #ClimateAction targets, w/ 
-emissions intensity down 48% from 2005

-Targets of carbon peak by 2030& neutrality by 2060
-Pledge not to build any more coal-fired power stations overseas
-Leadership at #COP15 #UN Biodiversity Conference

-preserving the environment written into the guidelines of China’s governing party

China must and will definitely achieve complete unification This is the righteous cause which accords not only with the aspiration of the people but also the irresistible general trend, and will never be stopped by anyone or any forces.

The one-China principle is a basic norm governing international relations and is the universal consensus of the international community. Taiwan issue is purely China’s internal affair and it will bear no interference from any outside forces.

As the spokesperson says, Taiwan has always been an integral part of China and never an independent country. There is only one China in the world. The government of the PRC is the sole legal government representing the whole China. This is the basic fact and common sense.

On 26 Oct, Financial Times published a letter entitled Chinese reunification is “righteous” and “irresistible” from the spokesperson of Chinese Embassy in response to its recent editorial which made a number of inaccurate comments about the Taiwan issue. https://t.co/PMA7Nd972S

It falls upon us to follow the prevailing trend of history & choose 
-cooperation over confrontation
-openness over seclusion
-mutual benefit over zero-sum games
& oppose all forms of 
-hegemony & power politics
-unilateralism & protectionism

President Xi on #ChinaUN50Years: Over 50 years, Chinese people have 
-written an epic chapter in Devt of China & humanity. 
-upheld Int’l Equity & Justice, contributing significantly to World Peace & Devt. 
-upheld the Authority & Sanctity of UN and practiced Multilateralism

China & UK enjoy distinct economic complementarity & huge potential for cooperation. Bilateral cooperation will surely provide strong support for respective national devt strategies.
China supports the UK in hosting #COP26 & hopes the conference will achieve positive results.

Wang Yi: Devt of China-UK relations goes beyond bilateral scope & has crucial regional & int’l impacts. 
Sound & stable devt of bilateral ties not only serves the fundamental interests of the two countries, but also meets the common expectation of int’l community.

#Biodiversity is essential to our ability to survive & thrive, providing all life on earth w/ a healthy & safe ecosystem, materials for production & consumption, and beautiful natural scenery. But global biodiversity has come under severe strain as human activities expand.
